channel.title: [508] Rs4ever V2 [508]
channel.description:
[center][size=22pt][b]Rs4ever 508[/b][/size][/center]
This is a [u]Mithscape[/u] based that was edited a ton by me. I kept the same home and spawning place so they both look the same but when you really get a look in side mine has a ton more features. [u]I gave credits to Mithscape and all first server posting so please dont flame me. [/u] :D
[center]Credits- 37% Me. 50% Mithscape (whiz'). 10% Guide's including moparscape. 3% David.[/center]
Updated Features: 1,Barrows minigame added, kill 1 teles to next one at end claim your reward (uses saved barrows points). 2,Real godwars all npcs drop there armor. 3,A form of Pest control that uses a point system with reward vender 120 points for full void and also dragon claws for 800. 4, Working corp beast that drops spirit sheilds. ::beast 5, pk point system added with reward vender rewards all vesta and statuis. 6, Moved shops to g.e and make them alot better added and took away items. 7, Removed god items since obtainable at ::godwars. 8, Removed barrows shop since obtainable at ::barrows. 9, Took down tarn minigame (causes more lag and connection errors). 10, Fixed the banking item thing you do not lose your banked items. 11, You know lose your items in pvp. If you kill them your the only one who can see the items. You also get a pk point. 12,Made a better econmay. 13, Fixed all quests they all give a reward and work 100%. 14, Added summoning shop you can buy summons and summon for summoning xp. 15, Made it so you can only summon a npc at one time also made a ::dismiss command and the dismiss button work. 16, New skills added- Added Fishing better base. Added Woodcutting. Added Slayer at the slayer tower 3 floors of all slayer monsters each need required lvl. Added Cooking. Added Runecrafting. Added herblore. Added Theiving. Added Fletching. I think i am forgetting one but the rest of them are on the way. 17, Worked on the Rune c'bow the max on npc's is now 53 max on players is 38. 18, Worked on Dark Bow uses 70% of special instead of 50%. 19, Dragon claws item 3101 are now fully coded and max is in place. 20, Coded 3 new godswords Zaros, Dragon, and brawler. 21, Messed with the shop prices to fix more to this server. 22, Max cash reward in pk is now 25m instead of like 500m. 23, Made a mute and ban log. 24, Made player chat log folder (Thanks david). 25, Messed with global objects they now load faster. 26, You cannot teleport out using a command in the wilderness. 27, Ancient staff works for auto-Ancients. 28, New staff zone on top of the Grand Exchange. 29, Server is more stable. 30, ::ipban user is about 70% done. 31, There is alot i am forgetting but i will let you guys figure that out. 32, Made ::commands, ::modcommands list. 33, Removed ::lol
New commands- ::barrows, ::beast, ::pc, ::commands, ::modcommands, ::fishing, ::cooking, ::stower, ::stwo, ::theiving, ::rc. ::woodcutting, ::wcguide, ::godwars, ::shops. What ever else i forgot.
Pictures-
Barrows [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/26yxs.jpg[/img]
Pest control [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/166c310.jpg[/img]
Shops [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2b8jki.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rhbgk7.jpg[/img]
Claws [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/15gwokz.jpg[/img]
Pk drops/Reward vender [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1z21soz.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2qiahpc.jpg[/img]
Godwars [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2u9jsrq.jpg[/img]
Server download- [url=http://uppit.com/v/E0NEYYVW]http://uppit.com/v/E0NEYYVW[/url]
Client Download[Updated]- [url=http://uppit.com/z4xjwlxidnf3/Rs4ever_V4_ipchanger_Client.rar]http://uppit.com/z4xjwlxidnf3/Rs4ever_V4_ipchanger_Client.rar[/url]
Credits again- 37% Me 50% Mithscape (whiz') 10% Guide in cluding moparscape 3% David
Thank you for viewing my first server, Chris (Rile0120)
(Please don't Flame its my first server) :D

item.title: [508] Rs4ever V2 [508]
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

william511:

Dude ::master doesnt work how do i fix it?

if (cmd[0].equals("master") && p.username.equals("chris")) { p.addSkillXP(13400000, 0); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 1); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 2); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 3); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 4); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 5); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 6); }

Just Change “Chris” for your name and Compile.

And for the max lvl is the same change the “masterskill” command, change “chris” to your name and compile

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Rs4ever V2 [508]
item.dc:creator: @dirzz dirzz
item.description:
@dirzz wrote:

[quote=“Rile0120, post:223, topic:324009”][quote author=winnetou1234 link=topic=420414.msg3363761#msg3363761 date=1286612536]
how to type the item command?
::item (1077) (1)
so?
and where i can change npc drop rate or npc drops?
[/quote]

The npcdrop folder is in the folder that follows -
Rs4ever V2 -> Src -> palidino76 -> rs2 -> npcs -> loading
The file is called “NpcDrops.java” and that’s where you can change or add npc drops.

If you do not have the ::item command for some reason just add what in below to your Commands.java file and compile it.

if (cmd[0].equals("item") && (p.rights >= 2)) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); }[/quote]
THANKS!

Read full topic
